alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Judith Basin; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 13 at 8:02PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of central Montana, including the following counties, Cascade, Judith Basin and Meagher. * WHEN...Until 915 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 759 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated continuing rainfall. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. Additional rain results in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Neihart and Monarch. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
